com.linkedin.cubert.operator.cube

Interface ValueAggregator


  • public interface ValueAggregator
    Stateless aggregator of values.

    The steps for aggregation are as follows:

    • this aggregator provides an initial value (via the initialValue method).
    • it aggregates the current value with the last aggregate (via the aggregate method) and reports the new aggregate

    This object must accept as well as report all aggregate values as long. The implementation is reponsible for converting other data types to long.

    See Also:
    ValueAggregationType, ValueAggregatorFactory, DefaultCubeAggregator, DefaultDupleCubeAggregator

      • aggregate

        long aggregate(long lastAggregate,
               Object currentValue)
        Computes aggregation of the last aggregated value with the current value. The invoker will ensure that the currentValue is never null.
        Parameters:
        lastAggregate - previous aggregated value
        currentValue - current value
        Returns:
        aggregated result of previous aggregated value and the current value

        Output the value in correct data type
        Parameters:

        Returns:
